ci_support_linux_64_.yaml:
channel_sources:
- conda-forge
channel_targets:
- conda-forge main
docker_image:
- quay.io/condaforge/linux-anvil-x86_64:alma9
python_min:
- '3.10'

about.description:
py-droplets provides python code for representing physical droplets using key parameters like position, size, or shape.
These droplets can also be represented as collections (emulsions) over time.
Moreover, the package provides methods for locating droplets in microscope images or phase field data from simulations.
about.summary: Python package for describing and analyzing droplets in experiments and simulations

about.description:
py-droplets provides python code for representing physical droplets using key parameters like position, size, or shape.
These droplets can also be represented as collections (emulsions) over time.
Moreover, the package provides methods for locating droplets in microscope images or phase field data from simulations.
about.summary: Python package for describing and analyzing droplets in experiments and simulations

name: py-droplets
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set name = "py-droplets" %}
{% set version = "0.26.0" %}

package:
  name: {{ name|lower }}
  version: {{ version }}

source:
  url: https://pypi.org/packages/source/{{ name[0] }}/{{ name }}/{{ name.replace('-', '_') }}-{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: c615203243963ca7278aad821b59afaea8b488b306aeaf515f9a56618724d7a5

build:
  noarch: python
  script: {{ PYTHON }} -m pip install . -vv
  number: 0

requirements:
  host:
    - python {{ python_min }}
    - pip
    - setuptools_scm
  run:
    - h5py >=2.10
    - matplotlib-base >=3.1
    - numba >=0.59
    - numpy >=1.23
    - python >={{ python_min }}
    - py-pde >=0.39
    - scipy >=1.4

test:
  requires:
    - pip
    - python {{ python_min }}
  imports:
    - droplets
  commands:
    - pip check
    # Check whether the pip version is reported correctly
    - pip list | grep -i {{ name }} | grep {{ version }}

about:
  home: https://github.com/zwicker-group/py-droplets
  summary: Python package for describing and analyzing droplets in experiments and simulations
  license: MIT
  license_file: LICENSE
  doc_url: https://py-droplets.readthedocs.io
  description: |
    py-droplets provides python code for representing physical droplets using key parameters like position, size, or shape.
    These droplets can also be represented as collections (emulsions) over time.
    Moreover, the package provides methods for locating droplets in microscope images or phase field data from simulations.


extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - david-zwicker
